mapper.select: SELECT user_id, username, pwd, role, clazz_name FROM user
SELECT user.user_id, username, upload_time FROM user, upload WHERE clazz_name = #{clazzName} AND user.user_id = upload.user_id GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY upload_time DESC
SELECT user_id, username FROM user WHERE user_id NOT IN (SELECT user.user_id FROM user, upload WHERE clazz_name = #{clazzName} AND user.user_id = upload.user_id) AND clazz_name = #{clazzName}
SELECT count(distinct user.user_id) FROM user, upload WHERE clazz_name = #{clazzName} AND user.user_id = upload.user_id
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user WHERE user_id NOT IN (SELECT user.user_id FROM user, upload WHERE clazz_name = #{clazzName} AND user.user_id = upload.user_id) AND clazz_name = #{clazzName}
